discussion_board_comment_id.description: The parent comment's ID being edited.

editor_member_id.description: The member ID performing the edit (original author or admin/moderator on behalf).

content.description: The new snapshot of comment text for this edit.

IDiscussionBoardCommentVersion,[object O.description: Request type for creating a new comment version (edit). Used by the comment edit flow or moderation override. Must specify parent comment, editor, and new content. Follows versioning and audit design. See schema and business logic for details.

pagination.description: Paging and counting information for pagination (see standard IPage)

data.description: Page of board admin entity records, one per admin user/assignment

IDiscussionBoardSystemNotice.IUpdate,[ob.description:
Paginated result set for admin records.

Array of board administrator assignments with pagination. Used in admin management UI.

setting_key.description: 등록할 설정의 고유 키 값. Prisma setting_key(UNIQUE) 컬럼의 비즈니스 요구를 따릅니다.

setting_value.description: 설정 텍스트 값. Prisma setting_value 컬럼을 참조합니다.

oneOf.description: (선택) 이 설정의 목적 또는 설명입니다. Prisma discussion_board_settings.description에서 유래했습니다. 비어있거나 null 허용됩니다.
(선택) 이 설정의 목적 또는 설명입니다. Prisma discussion_board_settings.description에서 유래했습니다. 비어있거나 null 허용됩니다.

description.description: (선택) 이 설정의 목적 또는 설명입니다. Prisma discussion_board_settings.description에서 유래했습니다. 비어있거나 null 허용됩니다.

IDiscussionBoardSetting,[object Object].description:
새로운 보드 설정을 생성할 때 사용하는 객체입니다. 관리자가 UI나 백엔드에서 신규 옵션, 플래그를 생성 시 제출합니다.

필수 입력은 고유 키 및 값이며, 설명은 선택입니다. Prisma discussion_board_settings ICreate 용도로 설계되었습니다.

oneOf.description: 필터링에 사용할 카테고리 이름입니다. 부분 일치 또는 정확히 매칭할 수 있습니다.

name.description: 필터링에 사용할 카테고리 이름입니다. 부분 일치 또는 정확히 매칭할 수 있습니다.

oneOf.description: 활성/비활성 카테고리 필터입니다. true: 활성, false: 비활성, null: 모든 상태.

is_active.description: 활성/비활성 카테고리 필터입니다. true: 활성, false: 비활성, null: 모든 상태.

oneOf.description: 특정 상위 카테고리 하위만 가져올 때 사용하는 parent_id입니다.

parent_id.description: 특정 상위 카테고리 하위만 가져올 때 사용하는 parent_id입니다.

oneOf.description: 생성일 기준 시작 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

created_at_start.description: 생성일 기준 시작 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

oneOf.description: 생성일 기준 종료 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

created_at_end.description: 생성일 기준 종료 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

oneOf.description: 수정일 기준 시작 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

updated_at_start.description: 수정일 기준 시작 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

oneOf.description: 수정일 기준 종료 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

updated_at_end.description: 수정일 기준 종료 범위 필터(ISO8601 형식의 타임스탬프).

oneOf.description: 정렬 필드명. 예) name, created_at, updated_at 등

sort.description: 정렬 필드명. 예) name, created_at, updated_at 등

oneOf.description: 정렬 방향(오름차순/내림차순)
정렬 방향(오름차순/내림차순)
조회할 페이지(기본 1)
페이지당 항목 수(기본: 100)

IPageIDiscussionBoardCategory,[object Ob.description:
게시판 카테고리 목록을 필터/검색하기 위한 요청 파라미터입니다.

이름, 활성 상태, 상위 카테고리, 생성일/수정일 범위, 정렬, 페이징 등 UI와 연동되는 필터입니다.

expires_at.description: The new ISO 8601 UTC expiry time for the session. Used for prolonging or curtailing the session lifespan.

terminated_at.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp marking when the session was explicitly terminated (e.g., logout, timeout, forced revoke). Null indicates session still active; set to ISO timestamp to mark session as closed.

IDiscussionBoardUserSession.ICreate,[obj.description: Request body for updating a user/guest session record. Only the fields explicitly listed in the schema may be patched: expires_at, terminated_at.

id.description:
Primary key UUID for the subscription record.

Unique identifier for each subscription in discussion_board_subscriptions.

subscriber_id.description:
UUID of the member who owns this subscription.

References discussion_board_members.id.

target_type.description:
Type of target entity being subscribed to. Should be either 'topic' or 'thread'.

Enables polymorphic subscriptions.

This is always required.

target_id.description: UUID of the entity this subscription targets (topic or thread).

notification_method.description: The preferred delivery method for this subscription (e.g., 'email', 'in-app').

is_active.description:
Whether this subscription is currently active.

If false, notifications are currently paused.

Enforced by the requirements.

subscribed_at.description:
Timestamp when the subscription was created.

This is set automatically on creation in discussion_board_subscriptions.

IPageIDiscussionBoardSubscription.ISumma.description: Summary record for a single discussion board subscription as seen in lists or overviews.

IPageIDiscussionBoardPostAttachment.ISum.description:
Summary object for a single discussion board post attachment.

Contains essential metadata fields about a file attached to a post. Intended for list or preview contexts, so non-essential fields or large binary data are omitted. Fields include:
- id (UUID): Primary key for the attachment record.
- discussion_board_post_id (UUID): The parent post to which this file is attached.
- uploader_member_id (UUID): Which board member uploaded this file (audit/compliance reference).
- file_uri (string): URI (link) for retrieving or previewing the file.
- file_name (string): The original file name presented to the user on upload.
- mime_type (string): File format (e.g., 'image/png').
- uploaded_at (DateTime): Timestamp for when the file was added.

These are sufficient to show a basic overview (list row, card, media preview, download link) in board UIs or moderation dashboards.

discussion_board_post_id.description: UUID referencing the post this file is attached to.

uploader_member_id.description: UUID of the board member who uploaded this file (audit reference).

file_uri.description: URI or public link for downloading or previewing the file. File storage is external (CDN, S3, etc).

uploaded_at.description: Timestamp for when the attachment was uploaded (ISO 8601 UTC).

id.description: Unique identifier for a registered discussion board member. This value is assigned by the system, conforming to UUID v4. Used for referencing member records in all board-related operations. (See Prisma: @id @db.Uuid)

user_identifier.description: External/business identifier for the user, such as a user UUID, SSO id, or normalized email. This is the principal mapping to a platform identity, and is guaranteed unique. (See Prisma: user_identifier, @unique)

joined_at.description: Timestamp at which the member joined/was registered on the discussion board. Used for auditing, onboarding analytics, and membership calculations. (See Prisma: joined_at, @db.Timestamptz)

oneOf.description: Timestamp marking when the member's participation was suspended. Null if the membership is still active; holds the suspension event time if suspended. (See Prisma: suspended_at, nullable)
Timestamp marking when the member's participation was suspended. Null if the membership is still active; holds the suspension event time if suspended. (See Prisma: suspended_at, nullable)

suspended_at.description: Timestamp marking when the member's participation was suspended. Null if the membership is still active; holds the suspension event time if suspended. (See Prisma: suspended_at, nullable)

IDiscussionBoardMember.IRequest,[object.description: Discussion Board Member record, representing a registered, authenticated user authorized for full participation. Mirrors the schema in the Actors domain with references to external identities. Includes join/suspension times for audit, privileges, and system workflows.

IDiscussionBoardReport.IUpdate,[object O.description: A page of summarized moderation actions, including pagination metadata and summaries as defined under IDiscussionBoardModerationAction.ISummary. Used for moderation audit/log UI overviews.

IPageIDiscussionBoardPost,[object Object.description:
Request structure for advanced searching/filtering of posts. Used in POST/PATCH for server-side search on the discussion_board_posts table.

All fields here are optional; only those with values are used for filter/scoping. Keeps adherence to Prisma table's model.

Used for advanced thread browsing, moderation views, and analytics.

For basic page/query, use IPage.IRequest.

threadId.description: Thread ID to filter posts by parent thread (discussion_board_thread_id in schema). If provided, restricts search to posts under the specified thread.

oneOf.description: Filter by creator member. Returns only posts authored by the specified board member (creator_member_id in schema).

creatorMemberId.description: Filter by creator member. Returns only posts authored by the specified board member (creator_member_id in schema).

isEdited.description: If provided, filters posts by their is_edited state. True for posts that have been edited; false for original/unmodified.

oneOf.description: Start of creation time window. Only posts created at or after this timestamp are returned.

createdFrom.description: Start of creation time window. Only posts created at or after this timestamp are returned.

oneOf.description: End of creation time window. Only posts created at or before this timestamp are returned.

createdTo.description: End of creation time window. Only posts created at or before this timestamp are returned.

deleted.description: If true, returns soft-deleted posts only. If false, returns only non-deleted posts. If omitted, both are included.

oneOf.description: If present, limits results to posts whose body contains this substring (case-insensitive, trgm-indexed in DB). Enables simple full-text search for post content.

bodySubstring.description: If present, limits results to posts whose body contains this substring (case-insensitive, trgm-indexed in DB). Enables simple full-text search for post content.

id.description:
활동 로그 고유 식별자(UUID).

감사 및 분석을 위한 단일 로그 레코드의 PK입니다.

actor_id.description: 행위자의 UUID. 액션을 수행한 사용자(회원/모더레이터/관리자/게스트)의 식별자입니다.

oneOf.description: 관련 토픽의 UUID(있을 경우).
관련 토픽의 UUID(있을 경우).
관련 스레드의 UUID(있을 경우).
관련 스레드의 UUID(있을 경우).
관련 게시물의 UUID(있을 경우).
관련 게시물의 UUID(있을 경우).

actor_type.description:
행위자의 역할 유형('member'/'moderator'/'admin'/'guest' 등).

감사 및 통계를 위한 구분자입니다.

oneOf.description: 행위자의 IP 주소 (있을 경우). GDPR 보호 및 보안 감사 트레일용입니다.
행위자의 IP 주소 (있을 경우). GDPR 보호 및 보안 감사 트레일용입니다.

ip_address.description: 행위자의 IP 주소 (있을 경우). GDPR 보호 및 보안 감사 트레일용입니다.

oneOf.description: 요청을 발생시킨 User-Agent (브라우저 또는 장치 식별용).
요청을 발생시킨 User-Agent (브라우저 또는 장치 식별용).

user_agent.description: 요청을 발생시킨 User-Agent (브라우저 또는 장치 식별용).

oneOf.description:
해당 활동에 대한 확장 JSON 메타 데이터.

예: 편집 사유, 변경 전/후 데이터, 추가 증거 등 다목적 용도로 사용. 문자열로 직렬화된 JSON.

해당 활동에 대한 확장 JSON 메타 데이터.

예: 편집 사유, 변경 전/후 데이터, 추가 증거 등 다목적 용도로 사용. 문자열로 직렬화된 JSON.

metadata_json.description:
해당 활동에 대한 확장 JSON 메타 데이터.

예: 편집 사유, 변경 전/후 데이터, 추가 증거 등 다목적 용도로 사용. 문자열로 직렬화된 JSON.

IDiscussionBoardActivityLog.IRequest,[ob.description:
단일 감사/통계 활동 로그 레코드.

각 액티비티에 대한 주요 정보와 관련 엔티티(주제, 스레드, 게시글 등)의 참조, 메타 데이터를 포함합니다. GDPR, 보안, 운영 분석, 분쟁 해결 등의 다양한 용도로 활용됩니다.
